view_strings.menu_quit_text: Are you sure to exit the program?
view_strings.menu_about_text:
This application has been developed as study project for 811375A User Interface Programming -course during academic year 2016 at the University of Oulu.
Authors: Aapo Keskimölö Software Design and Architecture, Test Automation Elisa Kortela Graphical User Interface Design
